messages:
Name: Taras Stepanenko
Nationality: Ukraine
Date of Birth: August 8, 1989
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Shakhtar Donetsk
Premier League clubs played for: Metalurh Zaporizhya, Shakhtar Donetsk

Taras Stepanenko, the Shakhtar Donetsk midfielder, has appeared in the vast majority of the club's Premier League games in 2020/2021, making 18 appearances overall and accumulating 1,198 minutes of playing time. He has been selected in the starting XI in 13 of these appearances across their 24 fixtures and come on as a substitute on five occasions.

Stepanenko last played in the competition on May 6 for Shakhtar Donetsk against Minai. He netted twice in that game for his club in their 4-0 success. He opened his account for the 2020/2021 competition with those goals. He has amassed four yellow cards.
Shakhtar Donetsk, who have 51 points are in second position in the table, play host to Inhulets' on May 9 the next time they are in Premier League action.
Last season for Shakhtar Donetsk, Stepanenko made 24 Premier League appearances, scored one goal and provided one assist.
Stepanenko switched to Shakhtar Donetsk in July 2010 from Metalurh Zaporizhya, for whom he made 46 league appearances in total.
